document.full_text: the consumer product safety commission re-announced on tuesday the recall of delta enterprise "safety peg" drop-side cribs after a second infant death associated with the crib.
document.title: delta cribs recall re-announced after infant death
lines_and_colors: the consumer product safety commission re-announced on tuesday the recall of delta enterprise "safety peg" drop-side cribs after a second infant death associated with the crib.
